name: Practice Makes Perfect
shortDesc: The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill.
sourceBook: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
trigger: You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.
desc: The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill. This bonus can change the outcome of the target's check.

name: Tireless Worker
shortDesc: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued.
sourceBook: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.
